mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rpg_character (name, table_id, creation_date, data) VALUES (#{name}, #{tableId}, #{creationDate}, #{data})
mapper.update: UPDATE rpg_character SET data = #{data} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT rc.id AS rc_id, rc.name AS rc_name, rc.table_id AS rc_table_id, rc.data AS rc_data, rc.player_id AS rc_player_id, rc.creation_date AS rc_creation_date, rt.id AS rt_id, rt.name AS rt_name, rt.game AS rt_game, rt.creation_date AS rt_creation_date, rt.gm_id AS rt_gm_id FROM rpg_character rc JOIN rpg_table rt ON rt.id = rc.table_id WHERE rc.id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE rpg_character SET player_id = #{playerId} WHERE id=#{id}
